page.title: 14BUTSER TURF COMPANY HORNDEAN
page.content: {Butser Turf}was formed in 1928 and was made a limited company in 1933. Mr.E. Edney established the business with A.T.Smeads. Turf is grown around the New Forest, West Sussex and Surrey. They have supplied places such as { {Wembley Stadium, Windsor Castle and {Wimbledon.}They also export to Germany, Jersey and France. The turf costs about 60p per square yard and comes from established pastures. After the land has been cultivated it is resown and used again. Butser Turf let their farmland to farmers who allow their sheep to graze. The company advertises in the local press and Yellow Pages as far as Cornwall but their lorries are their best advertisement. When the company celebrated their 50th anniversary in 1983, they calculated they had sold { {85,895,818}turves.
